changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO product (id, article, name, description, category, price, quantity, last_quantity_change_date, creation_date) SELECT gen_random_uuid(), 'Article ' || s, 'Product ' || s, 'Description ' || s, 'CLOTHING', 100.0, 50, NOW(), NOW() FROM generate_series(1, 1000000) s;
